texts.es: María invirtió su crédito anterior   cremas, perfumes, accesorios, productos que llegaron con buenos descuentos en sus catálogos y esto le permitió una mejor negociación con sus clientes; como necesita una vez mas mejorar su inventario, porque se acerca una temporada comercialmente muy buena, está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva con el cual comprará artículos de perfumería, accesorios femeninos, con los cuales exhibirá un mejor surtido,  que le brindará mayores oportunidades de ventas con sus clientes actuales y potenciales. Ella envía el siguiente mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva: “Gracias a su apoyo termine mis estudios de belleza integral, tengo otra opción donde realizo domicilios y atiendo en mi casa todo lo relacionado a manicure, pedicure, y peinados; adicionalmente tengo una excelente cartera de venta por productos por catálogos y con su ayuda seguiré ampliando y captando nuevos clientes, gracias”
texts.en:
María invested her previous loan in crèmes, perfumes, accessories, and other products. She received good discounts through the catalogs, which has allowed her to better negotiate with her customers.

Once again, she needs to improve her inventory because of the upcoming commercial season. Therfore, she is applying for a new Kiva loan in order to buy perfumes and women’s accessories that she will exhibit and use to improve her inventory. This will create better sales opportunities among her existing and potential customers.

María sends the following message to Kiva lenders: “Thanks for your support which has allowed me to finish my beauty studies. I now have the option to work from home where I offer manicures, pedicures, and hair styling services. In addition, I also have an excellent portfolio of catalog products to sell. This helps me to keep expanding and attracting new customers. Thank you!”

loans.use: to buy perfumes and women's accessories.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha, de 36 años, es una mujer luchadora, amable y emprendedora, convive junto a su pareja con quien tiene un pequeño hijo de tan solo 5 meses que se suma a sus otros dos hijos de 19 y 17 años de edad, tiene su casa propia que comparte con toda su familia ya que ellos lo inspiran a seguir adelante y ser cada día mejor. Martha tiene un trabajo que consiste en la venta de comida en diferentes lugares, ella se levanta temprano para empezar la faena diaria, cocina y lleva sus deliciosos potajes a los diferentes aserraderos de la ciudad, donde tiene clientes que ha podido ganar y mantener gracias a la calidad de los platillos que ofrece, tiene muy buena sazón y eso hace que sus clientes le sean fieles. Lleva trabajando por 5 años en esta actividad y se va sola ya que sus hijos tienen que estudiar. Le fascina hacer su trabajo por que siempre le gustó la cocina, desde muy niña le encantó el arte culinario y si esta labor viene acompañada de ganancias económicas es mejor aún. Asegura que es muy gratificante observar el rostro de agrado que muestran sus clientes cuando consumen sus potajes. Espera mas adelante consolidar su trabajo y progresar haciendo lo que mas le gusta. Este es el préstamo número 6 con MFP, está muy agradecida por la oportunidad crediticia que le brindan y por el respaldo financiero que necesita para seguir adelante. Se compromete a pagar sus cuotas mensuales de manera puntual y continuar trabajando con mucha responsabilidad junto a los miembros de su banco comunal. Con el monto solicitado 2000 soles, comprará verduras, tubérculos y diversas carnes para continuar preparando sus deliciosos potajes, además comprará platos descartables y un armario de cocina para guardar todos los utensilios que usa a diario en su faena laboral.
texts.en:
Martha is 36 years old and is hardworking, friendly and enterprising woman.  She lives with her husband and they have a new five-month-old boy, along with their other children, ages 19 and 17.  She has a home of her own which she shares with her family because they inspire her to continue.

Martha sells food in different places.  She gets up early to begin her daily tasks.  She cooks and takes her delicious dishes to different sawmills in town, where she has customers that she has been able to win and keep, thanks to the delicious seasoning she uses.  She’s been doing this for five years and does it alone, since her children have to go to school.  She always liked cooking, so she is fascinated by this work, so if it also provides earnings, then all the better.

She says that it’s very satisfying to see the faces of appreciation that her customers give her when they eat her dishes.  She hopes to consolidate her work in the future and move ahead doing what she enjoys.  This will be her 6th loan through MFP and she is grateful for the opportunity and support through the loans, allowing her to move ahead.

She promises to make her payments on time and continuing to work responsibly, along with the members of her communal bank.  She will use the 2,000 PEN from this loan to buy vegetables, tubers, and different meats so that she can continue to prepare her delicious dishes.  She will also buy a cabinet so she can store her kitchen utensils that she uses daily.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es:
Don Rafael tiene 34 años de edad, es acompañado y tiene tres hijos. Él se dedica al transporte de carga desde hace 9 años, un amigo fue quien le enseño esta actividad.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 20 bolsas de cemento y para pago de mano de obra. Para terminar de construir su casa, vivir cómodamente con su familia sin tener que pensar que alguien los pueda sacar de la casa. Su objetivo es construir una habitación a cada uno de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Rafael is 34 years old, married and has three children.  He has been transporting freight for the past nine years.  A friend showed him how to do this.

The loan he is requesting though Fundación Campo is so that he can buy 20 bags of cement and pay for labor so that he can finish building his home, and live comfortably with his family without having to think that someone can evict them from their home.  His goal is to build a room for each of his children.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Jorge Eduardo

texts.es: Jorge compró productos alimenticios que vendió mediante guías especializadas y también invirtió en cosméticos, ropa, calzado entre otros artículos que vendió oportunamente. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el cual comprará en mayor volumen esta mercancía.  Porque sus clientes crecieron y le han hecho nuevas solicitudes de Perfumería, productos nutricionales, ropa y calzado, así que Jorge estará aprovechando la temporada del segundo semestre de año, donde usualmente se incrementaran sus ventas y éñ obtiene mas utilidades. Muchos agradecimientos a Kiva y a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, porque con su ayuda espera fortalecer una vez mas su negocio, aumentar sus ventas y utilidades y con ello su nivel de vida
texts.en:
Jorge bought food products that he sold through specialized guides and also invested in cosmetics, clothing, and footwear, among other items that he sold when opportune. 

Currently, he is applying for a new Kiva loan, with which he will buy a higher volume of this merchandise.  Because his clientele has grown and they have made new requests for perfumery, nutritional products, clothing, and footwear, Jorge will be taking advantage of the season of the second half of the year, when his sales usually increase and he obtains more profits. 

Many thanks to Kiva and the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, because with their help he hopes to strengthen his business once more, and increase his sales and profits, and with these his standard of living.

loans.use: to buy perfumery, nutritional products, clothing, and footwear.

loans.name: Anvar

texts.en:
Anvar is married and has 4 children. Anvar is a person who always tries to earn money and provide a better life for his children. He began his own business dealing in animal husbandry and farming more than 10 years ago.

He has requested a loan in the amount of 12,500 somoni to increase the number of animals he has for sale and to buy mineral fertilizers for his land. He hopes for Kiva's cooperation in this loan since it will be used to improve his family's income.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers and cattle.

loans.name: Abdusattor

texts.en:
Abdusattor has a cafe in the center of his town. He opened it 10 years ago because he needed to work and take care of his son Abubakr as he is divorced. After organizing his business, the quality of his family's living conditions became better. He takes cares of the business himself. He cooks very tasty ‘kababs’. His working day starts at dawn when he goes to buy the meat for making ‘kababs’ and continues throughout the day. 

He wants to repair his cafe but he does not have enough money for it. He is asking for a loan in the amount of 14,000 somoni to buy building materials. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy building materials to repair his cafe.

loans.name: Lucero Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LUCERO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ines ella es casada y tiene 41 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de artesanía, la socia junto con su esposo realizan trabajos de artesanía como pinturas cusqueñas, ella pinta cuadros de pintura cusqueña que son muy tradicionales de la ciudad de Cusco, la socia tiene 15 años en este negocio y a ella le gusta mucho pintar y dibujar, también sus cuadros lo envía a lugares como Bolivia y Brasil, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos y su sueño es tener un tienda donde pueda vender sus cuadros. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales como pinturas, maderas, oleos y pinceles para que siga pintando sus cuadros cusqueños.
 Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de venta de muebles, negocio de venta de golosinas y negocio de restaurant.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the “Lucero” Communal Bank, which is located in the district of Cuzco, part of Cuzco Province and Cuzco Department.

The featured member is Sra. Ines, who is 42 years old, married and has two children. She has a business selling handicrafts and both she and her husband make the crafts, such as Cuzcan paintings. Ines paints traditional pictures of the city of Cuzco and has had this business for 15 years. Moreover she enjoys painting and drawing very much and also takes her pictures to places like Bolivia and Brasil. 

Through this business this member is helping her children get ahead. Her dream is to own a store where she can sell her pictures. This member is requesting the loan to purchase materials, such as paints, wood, oils and paintbrushes in order to continue painting her Cuzcan pictures.

The other members have businesses selling groceries, furniture, sweets and running a restaurant.

This member is grateful to those who are part of making her dreams come true in this way and is committed to making her payments within the established time period.

loans.use: purchase materials such as paints, wood, oils and paintbrushes so that she can continue painting her Cuzcan pictures.

loans.name: Julio Demetrio

texts.es:
El socio es el señor Julio, él sigue con su actividad económica de alquiler de computadoras en sus  cabinas de internet en un cibercafé que el implemento en su domicilio y que  además le sirve como bazar librería donde vende artículos de escritorio. Julio está solicitando el préstamo para comprar  mercadería como lapiceros, papel, cuadernos etc. para su negocio de librería.
Julio está muy agradecido con KIVA por ayudarlo en el mantenimiento de su actividad económica. El pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú.
texts.en:
This borrower is called Julio, and he continues with his business renting computers for internet use in an internet café that he set up in his home. This space also serves as a stationery store, where he sells stationery items. He has requested this loan to buy merchandise such as ballpoint pens, paper, notepads, etc. for his stationery business.

Julio is very grateful to Kiva for helping him to keep his business going. He is part of the Kanchary communal bank, which is located in the city of Cusco in Peru.

loans.use: to buy pens, paper and notepads for his stationery store

loans.name: Nyètaa Group

texts.fr:
Mariées majoritairement dans des familles nucléaires, les quatre femmes du groupe  Nyètaa ont en moyenne 41 ans et 5 enfants. Elles habitent toutes au quartier Médine dans la ville de Ségou et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de parenté et de leurs activités génératrices de revenu au marché Médine Ségou. Elles font l’achat et la vente du savon liquide, de la restauration, de la teinture et d’encens. 
Dans le souci d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso  avec qui, elles sont à leur 2ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Nana (femme assise en 2ème position de la  droite vers la  gauche sur la photo) est une grande teinturière dans son quartier. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter des colorants et de la potasse au  grand marché de Ségou. 
Pour faire de la teinture, on mélange les colorants selon la couleur demandée par la cliente et la potasse dans l’eau chaude sur le feu avant de tremper le bazin. Ensuite on l’étale au soleil pour l’assécher. 
Avec ce prêt,   Nana espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 20.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et assurer l’entretien des enfants du foyer.
texts.en:
The 4 female members of the Nyètaa group are married and mostly live in nuclear families. They have an average age of 41 and have, on average, 5 children. They all live in the Médine district of Ségou town and got to know each other thanks to neighbourly and family relationships, and because of their revenue-generating activities at the Médine Ségou market. They buy and sell liquid soaps, sell prepared food, perform dyeing services and sell incense. In order to increase their businesses, the members of the group decided to join the Soro Yiriwaso loan program and are on their second group loan.

Nana (the woman sitting second from the right in the picture) is a dyer who is well-know in her area. She plans to use her loan to buy colourings and potash at the Ségou Grand Market. In order to make dyes, the colourings are mixed according to the colour demanded by the customer and put together with the potash in hot water over a fire, before the damask fabric is dipped in the mixture. It is then spread in the sun to dry.

With the help of this loan, Nana hopes to make an average monthly profit of 20 000 francs, some of which will be reinvested into her business and some of which will be used to provide for the maintenance of the children in the household.

loans.use: to buy raw materials used for dyeing (potash and colourings).

loans.name: Nyéléni Group

texts.fr:
Les six femmes du groupe Nyéléni sont mariées majoritairement dans des familles monogames avec une moyenne d’âge de 45 ans et 4 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans le quartier Darsalam de Ségou (4ème région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de parenté et de leurs activités génératrices de revenu au marché Château Ségou. Elles font le petit commerce de pagnes wax, bazins, habits pour enfants, chaussures plastiques et jus locaux. Dans le but de satisfaire la clientèle de plus en plus croissante, les membres du groupe ont adhéré à Soro Yiriwaso  et sont à leur 10ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Adja Ramata (femme  debout en première position sur la photo de la gauche vers la droite) a une grande réputation dans la vente des pagnes wax et bazins à Darsalam et au marché Château. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 50 pièces de pagne wax. Elle se ravitaille en marchandises en gros au grand marché de Ségou et parfois à Bamako. La revente se fait à crédit et en espèce à une cliente composée majoritairement de femmes. Elle compte avoir un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 45.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge les soins de santé des enfants. Madame Adja Ramata a pour ambition l’achat d’un lot à usage d’habitation dans ce partenariat avec Soro Yiriwaso.
texts.en:
The six women comprising the Nyéléni group are married and mostly living in monogamous families, are on average 45 years old and have four children. They live in the Darsalam neighborhood in the city of Ségou (4th largest administrative region of Mali) and met through neighborhood links, family links and through their income-generating activities at the Château Ségou market. They are all involved in the sale of colorful African wax cloths, children's clothing, plastic shoes and local juices. In order to satisfy their growing client requests, the members of the group joined Soro Yiriwaso and are on their 10th loan.
Mrs Adja Ramata (seen in the photo as the person most on the left of those) has a very positive reputation for selling was cloths at Darsalam and the Château market. She plans to use this loan in order to purchase 50 pieces of was cloth. She stocks up on merchandise buy purchasing bulk quantities from the Ségou and Bamako markets, and re-sells them for cash and credit to a customer base comprised mostly of women. She hopes to earn a monthly revenue of 45,000 FCFA (~88 USD) which will be reinvested in her activity and used to take care of her children's health. Mrs Adja Ramata hopes to purchase a batch of clothing through this partnership with Soro Yiriwaso.

loans.use: purchase colorful African wax cloths

loans.name: Ambèkoun Group

texts.fr:
Mariées majoritairement dans des familles nucléaires, les quatre femmes du groupe  Ambèkoun ont en moyenne 37 ans et un enfant. Elles habitent toutes au quartier Médine dans la ville de Ségou et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de parenté et de leurs activités génératrices de revenu au marché Médine Ségou. Elles font l’achat et la vente des céréales, de la restauration, d’habits et de la teinture. 
Dans le souci d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso  avec qui, elles sont à leur 2ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Fanta (femme assise en 2ème position de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo) est une grande revendeuse de riz. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 2 sacs de riz au grand marché de Ségou. Elle effectue ses ventes en détail au comptant et à crédit à une clientèle mixte. Avec ce prêt,  Fanta espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 20.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge les petits besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
Married and mostly living in nuclear families, the four women comprising the Ambèkoun group are on average 37 years old and have one child. They all live in the Médine neighborhood of the city of Ségou, and met through neighborhood link, family links or throug their income generating activities at the Médine market. They all work in the purchase and sale of grains, food, clothing and dyes.
In order to increase the funds they have available for their activity, the members of this group decided to ask Soro Yiriwaso for a second loan. Fanta (second woman from the left in the photo) is a major re-seller of rice. She plans to use the loan to purchase two bags of rice from the market in Ségou. She sells her merchanise for both cash and credit to a mixed group of men and women. Fanta hopes this loan will allow her to earn a monthly revenue of approximately 20,000 FCFA (~40 USD), which she will reinvest in her activity and use to take care of the needs of her home.

loans.use: purchase rice

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy spare parts for her husband to sell for his business.

loans.name: Niginamo

texts.ru:
Нигинамо проживает в городе Куляб. Ей 54 года. Она замужем. Нигинамо имеет 8 детей. Сын Нигинамо находится на заработках за рубежом. Сама Нигинамо имеет среднее образование. Она занимается торговлей на рынке. У нее имеется собственная торговая точка, где она занимается торговлей одежды. В основном Нигинамо занимается торговлей детской одежды. Торговлей она занимается более восьми лет. 
Нигинамо просит кредит для приобретения еще одной торговой точки и покупки товара.
texts.en:
Niginamo lives in the city of Kulob. She is 54 years old, married, and has 8 children. Niginamo's son is working abroad to earn money. Niginamo has her high school education, and she works in retail at the market. She has her own market stall where she sells clothing, mainly children's wear. She has been working in retail for more than eight years.

Niginamo is seeking a loan to purchase one more market stall and to buy inventory.

loans.use: to purchase one more market stall and to buy inventory

loans.name: Azamkul

texts.ru:
Азамкул житель районе Восе. Ему 46 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро маленьких детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Азамкул имеет высшее педагогическое образование. По профессии он не работает. 
Азамкул вот уже двадцать лет как зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Он разводит скот у себя дома. Азамкул просит кредит для закупа двух бычков.
texts.en:
Azamkul lives in Vose. He is 46 years old, married, and has five young children. His wife is a homemaker. Azamkul did a university degree to become a qualified teacher, but he does not work in that profession. For the past 20 years, he has been earning a living by raising cattle at home. 

Azamkul is seeking a loan to buy two bulls.

loans.use: to buy two bulls.

loans.name: Dielle

texts.en:
Dielle lives in Northern Albania. She is 55 years old and married with four children between the ages of 20 and 34 years old. The youngest one is in school and all of the children live at home. Her husband doesn’t have a job of his own, but he helps Dielle. For the past three years, she has been operating a bar-cafe. One problem she faces at the moment is the lack of money to increase sales for her restaurant. 

She is requesting a loan to stock up on inventory items for her business. Dielle likes her business because of the way people respond to it and the income she earns. Knowing that that her profile will be posted on Kiva for support from lenders, she would like to deliver her appreciation to them.

loans.use: To stock up on inventory items for her bar-cafe.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure and fungicide for his squash crop.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: La socia es la señora Julia, casada y con 3 hijos, ella continua con su actividad de venta de calzado para damas, caballeros y niños, actividad que realiza hace algún tiempo y que le ha permitido educara a sus  hijos y proporcionar el sustento a su familia. Julia en esta oportunidad está solicitando el préstamo para comprar zapatos y capitalizar su actividad para la próxima campaña navideña. Julia está muy agradecida con la ayuda de KIVA, para fortalecer su actividad económica la cual le permite ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y educar a sus hijos. La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú.
texts.en: Julia’s married and has two children.  She continues selling shoes for women, men and children, an activity she’s been carrying out for some time that has made it possible for her to provide schooling for her children and sustenance for her family.  On this occasion, Julia’s asking for a loan to buy shoes and capitalize her business in preparation for the upcoming Christmas season.  Julia’s very grateful for Kiva’s help to strengthen her economic activity that allows her to provide better quality of life for her family and an education for her children.  She’s a member of the “Kanchary” communal bank in Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: to buy shoes at wholesale.

loans.name: Teofilo

texts.en: Teofilo is 53 years old, married, and has four grown-up children. He is raising his family in a village. He plants and harvests corn and vegetables to sell. Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, he also works in a hog-raising business to generate additional income. He aims to strengthen his business to earn a higher income and to continue to send his children to school. He planned to raise more pigs to sell, but due to insufficient capital, he is asking for an additional of PHP 34,000 to buy feed, vitamins, additional piglets to raise, and materials needed to improve his pigpen. He mentioned that he is able to improve his business and make it viable as he continues to work hard and strive for it. He hopes that someday he will improve his family's status of living so that his children will have a bright future.

loans.use: To buy feed, vitamins, additional piglets to raise, and materials needed to improve his pigpen

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for his school fees

loans.name: Yuly Astrid

texts.es:
Yuly tiene 30 años de edad, es casada y tiene una hija. Se dedica a la agricultura junto con su esposo; pues su papá le enseño esta actividad. Pero el trabajo más fuerte que posee Yuly es la confección de vestidos, esta actividad la aprendió de su mamá desde los 10 años de edad. A los 13 años asistió a una academia para perfeccionar su profesión. Hoy en día trabaja junto a su esposo en la confección de uniformes, además de trabajar en la agricultura. Ella se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. para preparar el desayuno, luego alista a su hija para que se vaya a la escuela; para retomar el trabajo en la sastrería que es durante todo el día. Los productos que necesita los adquiere en la ciudad, para llegar hasta ahí aborda un pick up que tarda sesenta minutos, posteriormente aborda un autobús que tarda otros sesenta minutos realiza las compras y luego se regresa a su casa. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 5 sacos de abono, semilla de maicillo y un litro de herbicidas. Al efectuar la inversión, ella podrá sembrar en buena época, para que su cosecha sea productiva y pueda obtener muy buenas ganancias. Su objetivo es trabajar muy fuerte, para ahorrar y proporcionarle el estudio a su hija hasta que se gradué en la universidad; pues ella no se le presento la oportunidad de estudiar.
texts.en:
Yuly, 30, is married and has a daughter.  She and her husband work in agriculture; her father taught her the occupation.  However, the more weighty work Yuly does is dressmaking, an occupation she learned from her mother at the age of 10.  At the age of 13 she attended an academy to hone her skills.  Today, she works alongside her husband manufacturing uniforms in addition to working in agriculture.  

She rises at 5am to prepare breakfast and get her daughter ready to go to school.  She then works all day in the tailor shop.  She needs to go to the city to buy the supplies she needs and to do so she takes a ride in a pick-up truck that takes 60 minutes and then takes a bus that takes an additional 60 minutes; she does her shopping and then returns home.

The loan she’s asking Fundación Campo for is to buy five sacks of manure, sorghum seeds and a liter of herbicide.  By making this purchase, she’ll be able to plant in a good season so that the harvest will be more productive and she can earn very good profits.  Her goal is to work very hard to save and provide schooling for her daughter until she graduates from university since she herself never got the opportunity to study.

loans.use: to buy five sacks of manure, sorghum seeds and a liter of herbicide.

loans.name: Sayvali

texts.ru: Сайвали проживает в городе Куляб. Ему 45 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам Сайвали предоставляет услугу. Он более шести лет работает таксистом. Он предоставляет услугу на собственном автомобиле. Сайвали просит кредит для приобретения новой автомашины. Свою имеющуюся автомашину он хочет продать.
texts.en:
Sayvali lives in the city of Kulob. He is 45 and married with four children. His wife stays at home.
Sayvali has run a taxi business on his personal car for more than six years.
Sayvali has requested a loan to buy a new car. He wants to sell his current car.

loans.use: to buy a new car

loans.name: Isabe

texts.es:
Isabe, de 26 años es una madre responsable. Vive en compañía de Juan, su esposo desde hace 7 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Xiomara y Mayte a los que cuidan en casa de sus suegros desde hace 5 años.  Como una reciente pareja con responsabilidades. Ellos distribuyen sus actividades, su esposo se dedica al trabajo de carpintería, soldadura y mantenimiento del gobierno local de su zona, ahí obtiene un dinero mensual, que le paga el estado peruano. Además ella se dedica a la crianza de cuyes, cuenta con 40 ejemplares, los cuales comercializa en la ciudad de Jauja, durante la feria. Pero la actividad que realizan juntos es la agricultura, con la siembra de maíz, papa, alfalfa y habas, los que realizan en terrenos agrícolas heredados, “eso me permite ahorrar mucho sobre todo la alfalfa que me sirve de alimento para mis animales”, afirma. Ahora planean comprar sus casa propia, saben que con trabajo y ahorro lo lograrán. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “hacienda” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde se siente feliz, pues recibe el apoyo de todos ustedes, quienes le permiten seguir en su negocio. Además promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociación lo conforman personas responsables y solidarias.
Isabe, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de semilla y fertilizantes naturales para su próxima siembra de alfalfa.
texts.en:
Isabe, 26, is a responsible mother.  She lives with Juan, her husband of 7 years.  They have two children: Xiomara and Mayte.  They’ve been caring for them for the last five years in her in-laws’’ house.  As a recent couple with responsibilities, they distribute their activities.  Her husband works in carpentry, welding and maintenance for the local government earning a monthly salary from the Peruvian government.  She raises guinea pigs; she has forty of them that she then sells in the city of Jauja on market day.  But the activity they carry out jointly is agriculture; they grow corn, potatoes, alfalfa and lima beans on land they inherited.  She says that this makes it possible for her to save much especially in alfalfa which she uses as animal feed.  They are now planning to buy a house of their own and they know that with hard work and by saving they will succeed in doing so.

She’s a member of the “Hacienda” communal bank and this is her second MFP loan.  She feels happy because she gets support from all of you who make it possible for her to continue in business.  She promises to be punctual with her installment payments because the association’s members are all responsible, supportive people.  Isabe will use the requested money to buy seeds and natural fertilizer for her next alfalfa planting.

loans.use: to buy alfalfa seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Rossana

texts.es:
La socia es la señora Rossana, 31 años de edad, casada  y con 2 hijos, ella se dedica  a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su tienda de abarrotes, actividad que desarrolla hace algún tiempo, la cual le ha permitido sacar adelante a su familia.
Rossana está solicitando el préstamo para invertirlo en capitalizar su tienda y comprar mercadería como arroz y azúcar. Rossana está muy agradecida con la ayuda de KIVA, para fortalecer su actividad económica la cual le permite ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y educar a sus hijos. La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú.
texts.en:
Rossana is 31 years old, married, and has two children. She works selling household staples in her grocery shop, a business she developed some time ago that has allowed her to take care of her family.

Rossana is requesting the loan to invest in her shop and buy merchandise like rice and sugar. Rossana is very grateful for the help from Kiva, for strengthening her economic activity, which has allowed her to offer her family a better quality of life and to educate her children. She belongs to the "Kanchary" communal bank in Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like rice and sugar.

loans.name: Flor

texts.es: Flor, de 36 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de su esposo Jaime, con quien tiene 2 hijos a los que cuida en la casa que alquiló desde hace 4 años. Ya tiene 2 años de experiencia en la venta de alimentos, su trabajo comienza desde las primeras horas del día, en la madrugada visita al mercado central donde compra diversas verduras y papa a los comerciantes mayoristas para luego vender las mismas en la feria de alimentos que se desarrolla en la ciudad los días miércoles y domingos. Después de comprar los alimentos los acomoda y comienza a vender a los pobladores por kilos de esa manera obtiene una mayor ganancia, le va muy bien en su trabajo pues obtiene buenas ganancias que le ayuda a cubrir algunos gastos, pero como es una mujer trabajadora los demás días de la semana se dedica a trabajar como peón en diferentes cultivos de donde obtiene ganancias diarias. Este es el crédito número 5 con MFP, por lo que promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, pues durante todo estos años el dinero le ayudó en dinamizar su negocio y por ende sus ingresos, además le agrada pertenecer a su asociación donde las personas son solidarias. Flor, invertirá el dinero en la compra de papa y hortalizas por cantidad para su venta.
texts.en:
Flor, 36, is a hardworking woman.  She lives with her husband, Jaime, and their two children she cares for in a house she rented four years ago.  She has two years’ experience selling food.  Her work starts at the wee hours of the morning.  She goes to the central market at dawn to buy various vegetables and potatoes from wholesalers to then resell in food street markets that take place in the city on Wednesdays and Sundays.  Once she buys the food items she arranges them and starts to sell them to residents by the kilo thus earning higher profits.  She does very well in her business because she earns good profits that help her cover some expenses but because she’s a hardworking woman on the other days of the week she works as a field hand in various crops earning a daily wage.

This is her fifth MFP loan and she promises to be punctual with her payments because throughout all these years the money has helped her make her business dynamic thus too her income.  Also, she enjoys belonging to her association where all the people are so supportive.  Flor will use the money to buy potatoes and vegetables in quantity to resell.

loans.use: to buy potatoes and vegetables.

loans.name: Etleva

texts.en:
Etleva is 35 years old and married with two children who are 14 and 9 years old.  She is from a small village in northeastern Albania.  Her main economic activity for the past five years has been looking after a vineyard full-time.  She completes all the relevant seasonal work to insure a good harvest.  The harvested produce is sold to store owners and other local customers who purchase grapes to make a special traditional drink called “raki” as well as wine.  Etleva works hard to maintain some savings and expand her agricultural business.

She has requested a loan of 200,000 ALL from VisionFund Albania in order to build an irrigation system. This investment will increase grape production as well as her income.  Etleva plans to reinvest in her vineyard to expand it and make it more profitable.  With the increased profit, Etleva will improve her family’s living conditions. 

She waits for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to build an irrigation system for her vineyard.

loans.name: Flor

texts.es: Flor, de 35 años es una mujer luchadora. Vive en compañía de sus 3 hijos a los que cuida en la casa que compró desde hace 8 años. Flor es una mujer de mucho coraje, formó la asociación y siempre cuida que todo este en orden como su negocio. Ella tiene más de 15 años de experiencia en la fabricación de ladrillos, en todo este tiempo logró muchos objetivos, como el de obtener 2 fábricas donde trabaja el máximo pues sus principales ventas los realiza a las diferentes obras de construcción del estado en esa región. Todos los días dese muy temprano ordena las actividades de los peones que trabajan con ella, para obtener el mayor provecho durante el día. Asimismo comenta que su mayor secreto es quemar los ladrillos con llantas, “el quemado con ramas es muy bueno, pero mucho mejor es con llantas, ya que obtiene una resistencia mejor, además ahorramos en cuestión de dinero”, afirma. Es por esta razón que desea seguir mejorando su negocio.  Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “juventud nueva generación” y este es el segundo préstamo con MFP, agradece el apoyo que recibe pues le ayudó a incrementar el capital de su negocio. Por esa razón promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Flor, invertirá el dinero en la compra de llantas, tierra y ramas para elaboración de ladrillos.
texts.en:
Flor, 35, is a tenacious woman.  She lives with her three children she cares for in the house she bought 8 years ago.  Flor is a very courageous woman.  She formed the association and always insures that everything is in order like in her business.  She has more than 15 years’ experience manufacturing bricks.  She’s reached many goals in all this time like obtaining two factories where she works to the fullest extent because her main sales are to various government building projects in the region.  

She gives the day laborers that work for her their orders every day very early in order to get the best results during the day.  She comments that her greatest secret is to fire the bricks using tires.  She says that using branches to fire them is good but using tires is much better because they turn out stronger and besides they save money.  This is why she wants to continue improving her business.

She’s a member of the “Juventud Nueva Generación” (Youth New Generation) communal bank and this is her second MFP loan.  She gives thanks for the support received because it helped her increase business capital.  For this reason, she promises to be punctual with her installment payments.  Flor will use the money to buy tires, dirt and branches to make bricks.

loans.use: to buy tires, dirt and branches to make bricks.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es: Noemí, de 25 años es una mujer tímida. Vive en compañía de su esposo Carlos, con quien tiene una hija: Ana, a la que cuida en una casa alquilada desde hace 2 años. Junto a su esposo todas las mañanas trabajan muy duro en su fábrica de ladrillos, “me gusta el trabajo pues paso la mayor parte del día con mi familia”, afirma. Tiene 4 años de experiencia en el negocio, comenta que no es nada difícil, pues sus padres también se dedicaban a este negocio y ella tuvo noción de la misma desde entonces. Durante el mes realizan un promedio de 12 millares los cuales comercializa en la misma zona, ya que es muy conocida en toda la región. Comenta que en este temporada tiene que aprovechar el máximo pues es verano y el sol ayuda mucho en el secado de los moldes de ladrillo que realiza, por lo que está pensando junto a su esposo poder contratar peones para que le ayuden en la jornada. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “juventud nueva generación” y este es el segundo préstamo con MFP, agradece el apoyo que recibe pues le ayudó a incrementar el capital de su negocio. Por esa razón promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Noemí, invertirá el dinero en la compra de tierra en cantidad para la elaboración de ladrillos.
texts.en:
Noemí, 25, is a shy woman.  She lives with her husband, Carlos, and they have a daughter, Ana, who she cares for in a house they’ve rented for two years.  She works very hard every morning with her husband in his brick factory.  She says that she likes the work because she spends most of the day with her family.  She has four years’ experience in the business and comments that it’s by no means easy.  Because her parents did the same kind of work she had the notion to do so too since then.  

They produce on average 12000 bricks monthly that are sold locally since she’s very well-known in the zone.  She comments that this is the season she has to take advantage of to the maximum degree because it’s summer and the sun helps a lot to dry the brick molds she makes which is why she and her husband are thinking about hiring day laborers to help them with the daily tasks.

She’s a member of the “Juventud Nueva Generación” (Youth New Generation) communal bank and this is her second MFP loan.  She is grateful for the support received because it helped her increase her business capital which is why she promises to be punctual with her installment payments.  Noemí will use the money to buy a large amount of dirt to make bricks.

loans.use: to buy dirt to make bricks in quantity.

loans.name: Maruja

texts.es:
La socia es la señora Maruja, 22 años de edad, soltera y con 1 hijo pequeño, ella se dedica  a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su tienda de abarrotes, actividad que desarrolla hace algún tiempo, la cual le ha permitido sacar a su pequeño hijo.
Maruja está solicitando el préstamo para invertirlo en capitalizar su tienda y comprar mercadería como arroz y azúcar. Maruja está muy agradecida con la ayuda de KIVA, para fortalecer su actividad económica la cual le permite ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo. La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú.
texts.en: Maruja, 22, is single and has a little boy.  She sells basic staples in her grocery store, an activity she’s been in for some time and that has made it possible for her to support her son.  Maruja is asking for a loan to capitalize her store buying merchandise like rice and sugar.  Maruja is very grateful for Kiva’s help to strengthen her economic activity that makes it possible for her to provide better quality of life for her son.  She is a member of the “Kanchary” communal bank in the city of Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and to pay some household expenses.

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es: La socia es la señora Ana Cecilia, casada y con 3 hijos, ella continua con la venta de productos de belleza como cosméticos y perfumería, actividad que realiza hace 11 años y que le ha permitido educara a sus  hijos y proporcionar el sustento a su familia. Ana Cecilia en esta oportunidad está solicitando el préstamo para comprar perfumes y cosméticos para cumplir con las solicitudes de sus clientes mayormente mujeres. Ana Cecilia está muy agradecida con la ayuda de KIVA, para fortalecer su actividad económica. La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú.
texts.en: Ana Cecilia’s married and has three children.  She continues selling beauty products like cosmetic s and perfume, an activity she’s been in for 11 years and that has made it possible for her to provide schooling for her children and sustenance for her home.  On this occasion, Ana Cecilia is requesting a loan to buy perfume and cosmetics to fill pending customer orders; most of her customers are women.  Ana Cecilia is very grateful for Kiva’s help to strengthen her economic activity.  She is a member of the “Kanchary” communal bank in the city of Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: to buy perfume and cosmetics.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal COMUZONE I ,el socio continua trabajando en una institucion publica ya son varios años que trabaja en esta institucion el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su trabajo,el socio es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
EL socio solicita el credito para pagar una de sus cuotas que adquiero al comprar su casa.
El socio se siente agradecido por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: He’s a member of the “Comuzone I” communal bank and continues employed by a public institution; he’s been working there for several years now and he does well at work thanks to the effort he puts into it every day.  He’s a responsible, dedicated person who supports his family this way.  He’s requesting a loan to make a house payment.  He’s grateful for the granted loan and commits to make his payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to make a house payment.

loans.name: Menh

texts.en: Menh is 63 years old. She is widowed and resides with two children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating rice and fattening up animals for more than twenty years, earning approximately $3 daily. Her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $5 daily. Menh is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase rice seeds, fertilizer and pesticide to use for farming. This purchase will help her rice farm grow well. In the future, she would like to purchase more farmland to expand her rice farm and rebuild her house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds, fertilizer and pesticide to use for farming

loans.name: Manushaqe

texts.en:
Manushaqe is in her late fifties and married, with two grownup children between 21 and 26 years old. They all live in a very rural village with beautiful scenery, in southern Albania. 
Livestock is the main activity of locals for earning an income and Manushaqe has been doing this these past eight years. Throughout the years, she’s been able to establish a strong clientele that gives some sort of financial security to her.
Manushaqe is requesting another loan this time to buy one more milk cow, to increase milk production. In the past she has got other loans, and she has repaid them all accordingly. 
She will await patiently for Kiva lenders' understanding and financial help.

loans.use: To buy one milk cow to increase milk production

loans.name: Romeo

texts.en: Romeo is a responsible father who aims to become successful and financially stable to give his children a bright future. He owns and manages their farm by planting corn and vegetables for sale. Due to the high cost of commodities, school fees, and transportation, he is engaged in the hog-raising business to generate additional income. He wants to improve and strengthen the business so that he will earn a higher income to satisfy his family needs and to support the education of his children. To improve the business, he is asking for Php25,000 to buy feeds, vitamins, additional piglets to raise, and materials needed to improve the pigpen. Despite problems and difficulties in life, he believes that he can improve the business because he has strong faith and determination to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, additional piglets to raise, and materials needed to improve the pigpen

loans.name: Marvin

texts.en:
Marvin is 22 years old and still single.  He did not pursue his studies in college because his parents cannot afford to finance his schooling.  Despite this, he did not lose hope.  He helps his parents cultivate their farmland by planting and harvesting corn and vegetables to sell.  At present, he aims to earn and save more income to invest in business in the future. 

He engages himself in a hog-raising business to generate additional income.  He wants to acquire more piglets to raise, but he does not have enough capital. Therefore, he is asking for a loan of 20,000 PHP in order to buy feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise.  He believes that this loan will enable him to improve his business and hopes that he will become successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 20 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de su hijo Deyvid al que cuida en una casa alquilada desde 4 meses, hasta que termine de construir su propia casa. Su principal característica es el trabajo duro, ella administra la fábrica de ladrillos que posee, gusta mucho del trabajo, pues según cuenta es natural de la ciudad de Lima, por lo que llegar a vivir en la tranquilidad del campo le gusto mucho. Desde ese entonces pasaron 4 años de trabajo y conocimiento de este negocio, como mujer hábil, ella encontró la forma de obtener mayores ganancias pues quema los ladrillos 2 veces al mes, a diferencia de los demás fábricas, “de esa manera cuando el cliente tiene necesidad de ladrillos en la mitad del mes, puede comprar en mi fábrica pues para esa temporada tengo ladrillos por millar listos”, comenta. Asimismo trata de ahorrar dinero en sus tiempos libres, buscando de los campos y bosques ramas por cantidad para quemar los ladrillos y no tener que comprar ella misma. Ahora desea seguir mejorando la calidad de sus ladrillos. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “juventud nueva generación” y este es el segundo préstamo con MFP, agradece el apoyo que recibe pues le ayudó a incrementar el capital de su negocio. Por esa razón promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Rosa, invertirá el dinero en la compra de arena y aserrín para la elaboración de ladrillos.
texts.en:
Rosa, age 20, is a hard-working woman who lives with her son Deyvid in a house she has been renting for 4 months while she works on completing construction of her own home. Her main attribute is that she works hard, overseeing her own brick production. She likes the work and says that she is a native of Lima so coming out to live in the country is a pleasure. Since then, she has spent 4 years working and coming to know this business. 

Being a resourceful woman, she figured out a way to earn a higher profit by firing her bricks two times a month, unlike most producers. "This way when the customers need bricks mid-month, they can buy mine as I have thousands of bricks ready at the time" she says. She also tries to save money in her spare time by searching the countryside for enough logs and branches to fire her bricks so as not to have to buy them. Now she wants to keep improving the quality of her bricks. She belongs to the "New Youth Generation" solidarity group and this is her second loan with Microfinanzas Prisma [Kiva field partner]. She is thankful for the support she has gotten as it has helped her to grow her business's capital. That's why she promises to be punctual in making her payments. Rosa will invest the money in buying sand and sawdust for making bricks.

loans.use: to buy sand and sawdust for making bricks.

loans.name: Edith

texts.en: Edith used the previous loan to buy sodas, beers and fresh foods to sell.  She is a 32-year-old married woman with two children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda.  Her family goal is to educate her children up to the university level and construct a good house for the family.  She has the challenge of limited capital to invest in her business.  In her hotel she provides accommodation for 30 people per night and her desire is to have a five star hotel in the next ten years.  Edith is requesting a loan to buy beer and renovate the hotel rooms.

loans.use: to buy beer and  renovate the hotel rooms.
